title: Serif similar to FF Meta Serif
author: dead.sound

comments.content: **[Guardian Egyptian Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122426/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=CommercialType%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Guardian%20TextEgyp%20-%20Regular&fid=c27de3c3653b06c2149bb8d33741a048&fsize=60&text=Premier%20League%20spending%2C&wrap=2)** by Paul Barnes and Christian Schwartz [2008-09]

@fvilanakis So that's why its so familiar! I've read the guardian on mobile a couple times which is why the typeface looked so familiar. Too bad it's custom-I'd really love to get it. I wonder what typeface it's based upon? Thanks mate. Cheers
